Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;ice crystal^reset; to the ^green;scientist^reset; at the first floor of the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Texts.Chs: 把^orange;冰晶体^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。

Texts.Eng: Have a nice hunk of cash as my thanks.
Texts.Chs: 干的不错，这是你应得的奖励。

Texts.Eng: I've heard of ^orange;ice crystals^reset; before, but I have yet to actually see one. Can you bring me one? I have no idea where they even come from!
Texts.Chs: 我只听说过^orange;冰晶体^reset;，不过我从未见过。你能不能找一个给我？我连它们从哪里来都不知道！
